resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Ay lasso me dolente, deyo finire / Per ben servire (h)e lealment' amare.
resource.chars: Ay lasso me dolente, deyo finire / Per ben servire (h)e lealment' amare.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Secorime [oramai] del myo langore. / Cour de cor(e) myo, non me la[s]sar morire.
resource.chars: Secorime [oramai] del myo langore. / Cour de cor(e) myo, non me la[s]sar morire.
